00446   {}

00449 
00450   const char *get_mount(const char *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *dir,
00451                         cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt = 0) throw();

00454              cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *f) throw();
00455

00457   int remove_ref() throw() { return --_ref_cnt; }

00462   { return _mount_tree; }

00473 
00474 class Path
00475 {
00476 private:
00477   char const *_p;
00478   unsigned _l;
00479 
00480 public:
00481   Path() throw() : _p(0), _l(0) {}
00482 
00483   explicit Path(char const *p) throw() : _p(p)
00484   { for (_l = 0; *p; ++p, ++_l) ; }
00485 
00486   Path(char const *p, unsigned l) throw() : _p(p), _l(l)
00487   {}
00488 
00489   static bool __is_sep(char s) throw();
00490 
00491   Path cmp_path(char const *prefix) const throw();
00492 
00493   struct Invalid_ptr;
00494   operator Invalid_ptr const * () const
00495   { return reinterpret_cast<Invalid_ptr const *>(_p); }
00496 
00497   unsigned length() const { return _l; }
00498   char const *path() const { return _p; }
00499 
00500   bool empty() const { return _l == 0; }
00501 
00502   bool is_sep(unsigned offset) const { return __is_sep(_p[offset]); }
00503 
00504   bool strip_sep()
00505   {
00506     bool s = false;
00507     for (; __is_sep(*_p) && _l; ++_p, --_l)
00508       s = true;
00509     return s;
00510   }
00511 
00512   Path first() const
00513   {
00514     unsigned i;
00515     for (i = 0; i < _l && !is_sep(i); ++i)
00516       ;
00517 
00518     return Path(_p, i);
00519   }
00520 
00521   Path strip_first()
00522   {
00523     Path r = first();
00524     _p += r.length();
00525     _l -= r.length();
00526     strip_sep();
00527     return r;
00528   }
00529 
00530 };
00531 
00532 
00539 class Mount_tree
00540 {
00541 public:
00542 
00543   explicit Mount_tree(char *n) throw();
00544 
00545   Path lookup(Path const &path, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt,
00546               cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mp = 0) throw();
00547 
00548   Path find(Path const &p, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *t) throw();
00549 
00550   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> mount() const
00551   { return _mount; }
00552 
00553   void mount(cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &m)
00554   {
00555     m->_mount_tree = this;
00556     _mount = m;
00557   }
00558 
00559   static int create_tree(cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> const &root,
00560                          char const *path,
00561                          cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw();
00562 
00563   void add_child_node(Mount_tree *cld);
00564 
00565   virtual ~Mount_tree() throw()  = 0;
00566 
00567   void add_ref() throw() { ++_ref_cnt; }
00568   int remove_ref() throw() { return --_ref_cnt; }
00569 
00570 private:
00571   friend class Real_mount_tree;
00572 
00573   int _ref_cnt;
00574   char *_name;
00575   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> _cld;
00576   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> _sib;
00577   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> _mount;
00578 };
00579 
00580 inline
00581 Mount_tree::~Mount_tree() throw()
00582 {}
00583 
00584 inline bool
00585 Path::__is_sep(char s) throw()
00586 { return s == '/'; }
00587 
00588 inline Path
00589 Path::cmp_path(char const *n) const throw()
00590 {
00591   char const *p = _p;
00592   for (; *p && !__is_sep(*p) && *n; ++p, ++n)
00593     if (*p != *n)
00594       return Path();
00595 
00596   if (*n || (*p && !__is_sep(*p)))
00597     return Path();
00598 
00599   return Path(p, _l - (p - _p));
00600 }
00601 
00602 inline
00603 Mount_tree::Mount_tree(char *n) throw()
00604 : _ref_cnt(0), _name(n)
00605 {}
00606 
00607 inline Path
00608 Mount_tree::find(Path const &p, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *t) throw()
00609 {
00610   if (!_cld)
00611     return Path();
00612 
00613   for (cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> x = _cld; x; x = x->_sib)
00614     {
00615       Path const r = p.cmp_path(x->_name);
00616       if (r)
00617   {
00618     *t = x;
00619     return r;
00620   }
00621     }
00622 
00623   return Path();
00624 }
00625 
00626 inline Path
00627 Mount_tree::lookup(Path const &path, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt,
00628                    cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mp) throw()
00629 {
00630   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> x(this);
00631   Path p = path;
00632   Path last_mp = p;
00633 
00634   if (mp)
00635     *mp = this;
00636 
00637   while (1)
00638     {
00639       Path r = x->find(p, &x);
00640 
00641       if (!r)
00642   {
00643     if (mp)
00644       return last_mp;
00645 
00646     if (mt)
00647       *mt = x;
00648 
00649     return p;
00650   }
00651 
00652       r.strip_sep();
00653 
00654       if (mp && x->_mount)
00655   {
00656     last_mp = r;
00657     *mp = x;
00658   }
00659 
00660       if (r.empty())
00661   {
00662     if (mt)
00663       *mt = x;
00664 
00665     if (mp)
00666       return last_mp;
00667     else
00668       return r;
00669   }
00670 
00671       p = r;
00672     }
00673 }
00674 
00675 inline
00676 void
00677 Mount_tree::add_child_node(Mount_tree *cld)
00678 {
00679   cld->_sib = _cld;
00680   _cld = cld;
00681 }
00682 
00687 class Real_mount_tree : public Mount_tree
00688 {
00689 public:
00690   explicit Real_mount_tree(char *n) : Mount_tree(n) {}
00691 };
00692 
00693 inline int
00694 Mount_tree::create_tree(cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> const &root,
00695                         char const *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw()
00696 {
00697   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> base;
00698   Path p = root->lookup(Path(path), &base);
00699 
00700   while (!p.empty())
00701     {
00702       Path f = p.strip_first();
00703 
00704       if (f.empty())
00705   return -EEXIST;
00706 
00707       char *name = strndup(f.path(), f.length());
00708       if (!name)
00709   return -ENOMEM;
00710 
00711       cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> nt(new Real_mount_tree(name));
00712       if (!nt)
00713   {
00714     free(name);
00715     return -ENOMEM;
00716   }
00717 
00718       nt->_sib = base->_cld;
00719       base->_cld = nt;
00720 
00721       base = nt;
00722 
00723       if (p.empty())
00724   {
00725     nt->_mount = dir;
00726     return 0;
00727   }
00728     }
00729 
00730   return -EINVAL;
00731 }
00732 
00733 inline
00734 const char *
00735 File::get_mount(const char *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *dir,
00736                 cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt) throw()
00737 {
00738   if (!_mount_tree)
00739     {
00740       *dir = this;
00741       return path;
00742     }
00743 
00744   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> mp;
00745   Path p = _mount_tree->lookup(Path(path), mt, &mp);
00746   if (mp->mount())
00747     {
00748       *dir = mp->mount();
00749       return p.path();
00750     }
00751   else
00752     {
00753       *dir = this;
00754       return path;
00755     }
00756 }
00757 
00758 inline int
00759 File::openat(const char *path, int flags, mode_t mode,
00760              cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *f) throw()
00761 {
00762   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> dir;
00763   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> mt;
00764   path = get_mount(path, &dir, &mt);
00765 
00766   int res = dir->get_entry(path, flags, mode, f);
00767 
00768   if (res < 0)
00769     return res;
00770 
00771   if (!(*f)->_mount_tree && mt)
00772     (*f)->_mount_tree = mt;
00773 
00774   return res;
00775 }

00794

00797                      void **new_adr) throw() = 0;
00798 
00800   virtual int mprotect(const void *a, size_t sz, int prot) throw() = 0;
00801 
00803   virtual int msync(void *addr, size_t len, int flags) throw() = 0;
00804 
00806   virtual int madvise(void *addr, size_t len, int advice) throw() = 0;
00807

00809 };

00879 class Fs
00880 {
00881 public:
00887   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> get_file(int fd) throw() = 0;
00888 
00890   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> get_root() throw() = 0;
00891 
00893   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> get_cwd() throw() { return get_root(); }
00894 
00896   virtual void set_cwd(cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &) throw() {}
00897 
00903   virtual int alloc_fd(cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &f = cxx::Ref_ptr<>::Nil) throw() = 0;
00904 
00911   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> set_fd(int fd, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &f = cxx::Ref_ptr<>::Nil) throw() = 0;
00912 
00918   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> free_fd(int fd) throw() = 0;
00919 
00927   int mount(char const *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw();
00928 
00936   virtual int register_file_system(File_system *f) throw() = 0;
00937 
00945   virtual int unregister_file_system(File_system *f) throw() = 0;
00946 
00954   virtual File_system *get_file_system(char const *fstype) throw() = 0;
00955 
00959   int mount(char const *source, char const *target,
00960             char const *fstype, unsigned long mountflags,
00961             void const *data) throw();
00962 
00963   virtual ~Fs() = 0;
00964 };
00965 
00966 
00967 inline int
00968 Fs::mount(char const *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw()
00969 {
00970   if (cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> root = get_root()->mount_tree())
00971     return Mount_tree::create_tree(root, path, dir);
00972 
00973   return -EINVAL;
00974 }
00975 
00976 inline int
00977 Fs::mount(char const *source, char const *target,
00978           char const *fstype, unsigned long mountflags,
00979           void const *data) throw()
00980 {
00981   File_system *fs = get_file_system(fstype);
00982 
00983   if (!fs)
00984     return -ENODEV;
00985 
00986   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> dir;
00987   int res = fs->mount(source, mountflags, data, &dir);
00988 
00989   if (res < 0)
00990     return res;
00991 
00992   return mount(target, dir);
00993 }
00994 
00995 inline
00996 Fs::~Fs()
00997 {}
